languages.text: {n}Голос Ардженты дрожит от горя и ярости.{/n} "Покуда жива хоть одна тварь из рода врагов Человечества, невинные будут страдать в муках... не это ли знак, что нам должно не покладая рук очищать вселенную от ксеносов?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос Ардженты дрожит от горя и ярости.{/n} "Покуда жива хоть одна тварь из рода врагов Человечества, невинные будут страдать в муках... не это ли знак, что нам должно не покладая рук очищать вселенную от ксеносов?"

languages.text: {n}Argenta's voice trembles with sorrow and rage.{/n} "Until the last beast among the enemies of Humanity is dead, the innocent will continue to suffer torment... Is this not a sign that we must work doggedly to rid the universe of xenos?"
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Ардженты дрожит от горя и ярости.{/n} "Покуда жива хоть одна тварь из рода врагов Человечества, невинные будут страдать в муках... не это ли знак, что нам должно не покладая рук очищать вселенную от ксеносов?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's voice trembles with sorrow and rage.{/n} "Until the last beast of that race of enemies of Humanity are dead, the innocent will continue to suffer torment... Is this not a sign that must work doggedly to rid the universe of xenos?"

{n}Argenta's voice trembles with sorrow and rage.{/n} "Until the last beast of that race of enemies of Humanity are dead, the innocent will continue to suffer torment... Is this not a sign that must work doggedly to rid the universe of xenos?"

{n}Argenta's voice trembles with sorrow and rage.{/n} "Until the last beast of that race of enemies of Humanity are dead, the innocent will continue to suffer torment... Is this not a sign that must work doggedly to rid the universe of xenos?"

{n}Argenta's voice trembles with sorrow and rage.{/n} "Until the last beast of that race of enemies of Humanity are dead, the innocent will continue to suffer torment... Is this not a sign that must work doggedly to rid the universe of xenos?"

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの声が悲しみと怒りで震える。{/n}「人類の敵である最後の獣1体が死ぬまで、罪なき人々は苦しみ続ける…これは宇宙から異種族を排除するために心身を注ぐべしという証ではないか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's voice trembles with sorrow and rage.{/n} "Until the last beast among the enemies of Humanity is dead, the innocent will continue to suffer torment... Is this not a sign that we must work doggedly to rid the universe of xenos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの声が悲しみと怒りで震える。{/n}「人類の敵であるあの種族の最後の1体が死ぬまで、罪なき人々は苦しみ続ける…これは宇宙から異種族を排除するために心身を注ぐべしという証ではないか？」

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的声音因悲伤和愤怒而颤抖。{/n}“无辜的人们会继续遭受折磨，直到人类之敌的最后一员被彻底铲除……我们必须坚持不懈地铲除宇宙中的一切异形，这不就是最好的例证吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's voice trembles with sorrow and rage.{/n} "Until the last beast among the enemies of Humanity is dead, the innocent will continue to suffer torment... Is this not a sign that we must work doggedly to rid the universe of xenos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的声音因悲伤和愤怒而颤抖。{/n}“无辜的人们会继续遭受折磨，直到人类之敌的最后一员被彻底铲除……我们必须坚持不懈地铲除宇宙中的一切异形，这不就是最好的例证吗？”

languages.text: {n}La voz de Argenta tiembla bajo el peso de su tristeza y su furia.{/n} «Hasta que la última bestia enemiga de la Humanidad esté muerta, los inocentes seguirán sufriendo sus torturas... ¿Qué más pruebas hacen falta para saber que debemos purgar el universo de xenos?».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's voice trembles with sorrow and rage.{/n} "Until the last beast among the enemies of Humanity is dead, the innocent will continue to suffer torment... Is this not a sign that we must work doggedly to rid the universe of xenos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Argenta tiembla bajo el peso de su tristeza y su furia.{/n} «Hasta que la última bestia de esta abominable raza enemiga de la Humanidad esté muerta, los inocentes seguirán sufriendo sus torturas... ¿Qué más pruebas hacen falta para saber que debemos purgar el universo de xenos?».

languages.text: {n}La voix d'Argenta tremble de chagrin et de rage.{/n} « Tant que le dernier représentant de ces ennemis de l'humanité n'aura pas été exterminé, des innocents continueront à souffrir... N'est-ce pas le signe que nous devons tout faire pour débarrasser l'univers des xénos ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's voice trembles with sorrow and rage.{/n} "Until the last beast among the enemies of Humanity is dead, the innocent will continue to suffer torment... Is this not a sign that we must work doggedly to rid the universe of xenos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix d'Argenta tremble de chagrin et de rage.{/n} « Tant que le dernier représentant de ces ennemis de l'humanité n'aura pas été exterminé, des innocents continueront à souffrir... N'est-ce pas le signe que nous devons tout faire pour débarrasser l'univers des xénos ? »

languages.text: {n}Argentas Stimme zittert vor Traurigkeit und Wut.{/n} "Bis die letzte Bestie der Feinde der Menschheit tot ist, müssen die Unschuldigen weiterhin leiden ... Ist das kein Zeichen, dass wir alles tun müssen, um das Universum von Xenos zu befreien?"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's voice trembles with sorrow and rage.{/n} "Until the last beast among the enemies of Humanity is dead, the innocent will continue to suffer torment... Is this not a sign that we must work doggedly to rid the universe of xenos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Stimme zittert vor Traurigkeit und Wut.{/n} "Bis die letzte Bestie dieser Feinde der Menschheit tot ist, müssen die Unschuldigen weiterhin leiden ... Ist das kein Zeichen, dass wir alles tun müssen, um das Universum von Xenos zu befreien?"

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın sesi üzüntü ve öfkeyle titriyor.{/n} "İnsanlığın düşmanları arasındaki son yaratık da ölene kadar masumlar işkence çekmeye devam edecek. Bu, evreni zenolardan arındırmak için canla başla çalışmamız gerektiğine işaret değildir de nedir?"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's voice trembles with sorrow and rage.{/n} "Until the last beast among the enemies of Humanity is dead, the innocent will continue to suffer torment... Is this not a sign that we must work doggedly to rid the universe of xenos?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta'nın sesi üzüntü ve öfkeyle titriyor.{/n} "İnsanlığın düşmanları arasındaki son yaratık da ölene kadar masumlar işkence çekmeye devam edecek. Bu, evreni zenolardan arındırmak için canla başla çalışmamız gerektiğine işaret değildir de nedir?"
